    public class SSIZCurveChart
extends org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel
    SSIZCurveChart Class. Chart class for displaying the results of the FHSampleSize simulations analysis.

                              int width,

                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Save chart as PDF file. Requires iText library.
        Parameters:

        fileName - Name of file to save chart in.

        height - Height of chart graphic.
